mapper.insert: insert into LOAN_ORG_BANK_CONSTRAINT (SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, BANKDATATYPE, PRIORITY, WEIGHT, CONTROLTYPE, MONTHLIMIT, PUTOUTMULTIPLE, CHARGETYPE, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, DAYLIMIT, REPORTTERM, TEMPSAVEFLAG, RELATIVETYPE, REMAINMONTHLIMIT, REMAINDAYLIMIT ) values (#{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relativeserialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankdatatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{controltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monthlimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{putoutmultiple,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daylimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tempsaveflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relativetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remainmonthlimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remaindaylimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.select: select SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, BANKDATATYPE, PRIORITY, WEIGHT, CONTROLTYPE, MONTHLIMIT, PUTOUTMULTIPLE, CHARGETYPE, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, DAYLIMIT, REPORTTERM, TEMPSAVEFLAG, RELATIVETYPE, REMAINMONTHLIMIT, REMAINDAYLIMIT from LOAN_ORG_BANK_CONSTRAINT where SERIALNO = #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
